item.title: Helloworld
item.description: TL;DR: Typora requires Pandoc (â‰¥ v1.20). If you do not have Pandoc or only old version of Pandoc installed on your machine, you could: Download installer from Download Page and install or update Pandoc. For windows users, if typora still saying it cannot found Pandoc, you may need try to restart your PC. Pandoc Integration In Typora, import function and export function for some file formats (including docx, odt, rtf, epub, LaTeX and wiki) are powered by a 3rd party software named Pandoc.
